components.name: QuanticBreadcrumbManager
components.description: The `QuanticBreadcrumbManager component creates breadcrumbs that display a summary of the currently active facet values.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: categoryDivider
properties.description: A character that divides each path segment in a category facet breadcrumb.

properties.name: collapseThreshold
properties.description: Number of breadcrumbs to display when collapsed.

components.name: QuanticCardContainer
components.description: The QuanticCardContainer component is used internally as a styling container.

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title label to display in the card header.

components.name: QuanticDateFacet
components.description: The QuanticDateFacet component displays facet values as date ranges.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: facetId
properties.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the facet.

properties.name: field
properties.description: Specifies the index field whose values the facet should use.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The non-localized label for the facet.

properties.name: numberOfValues
properties.description: The number of values to request for this facet, when there are no manual ranges.

properties.name: formattingFunction
properties.description: The function used to format the date facet value label. The default result format is the following: [start] - [end]

components.name: QuanticDidYouMean
components.description: The QuanticDidYouMean component is responsible for handling query corrections. When a query returns no result but finds a possible query correction, the component either suggests the correction or automatically triggers a new query with the suggested term.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

components.name: QuanticFacet
components.description:
A facet is a list of values for a certain field occurring in the results, ordered using a configurable criteria (e.g., number of occurrences).
A QuanticFacet displays a facet of the results for the current query.

properties.name: facetId
properties.description: An unique ID used to identify the facet instance. Defaults to given facet label.

properties.name: field
properties.description: The field whose values you want to display in the facet.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The non-localized label for the facet.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: numberOfValues
properties.description: The number of values to request for this facet. Also determines the number of additional values to request each time this facet is expanded, and the number of values to display when this facet is collapsed.

properties.name: sortCriteria
properties.description:
The sort criterion to apply to the returned facet values Possible values are:

  • score
  • numeric
  • occurences
  • automatic

properties.name: noSearch
properties.description: Whether this facet should not contain a search box.

components.name: QuanticFacetValue
components.description: The QuanticFacetValue component is used by a facet component to display a formatted facet value and number of results with that value.

properties.name: item
properties.description: The facet value to display.

properties.name: isChecked
properties.description: Whether the checkbox ist checked.

properties.name: formattingFunction
properties.description: A function used to format the displayed value.

components.name: QuanticNoResults
components.description: The QuanticNoResults component displays search tips and a "Cancel last action" button when there are no results. Any additional content slotted inside of its element will be displayed as well.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: disableCancelLastAction
properties.description: Whether to display a button which cancels the last available action.

components.name: QuanticNumberButton
components.description: The QuanticNumberButton component is used internally to display a button in a set of buttons with numeric labels.

properties.name: number
properties.description: The number to display as button label.

properties.name: current
properties.description: The selected number in the set of buttons.

components.name: QuanticNumericFacet
components.description: The QuanticNumericFacet component displays facet values as numeric ranges.

properties.name: facetId
properties.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the facet.

properties.name: field
properties.description: Specifies the index field whose values the facet should use.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The non-localized label for the facet.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: numberOfValues
properties.description: The number of values to request for this facet, when there are no manual ranges.

properties.name: sortCriteria
properties.description: The number of values to request for this facet, when there are no manual ranges.

properties.name: rangeAlgorithm
properties.description: The algorithm that’s used for generating the ranges of this facet when they aren’t manually defined. The default value of "even" generates equally sized facet ranges across all of the results. The value "equiprobable" generates facet ranges which vary in size but have a more balanced number of results within each range.

properties.name: formattingFunction
properties.description: The function used to format the date facet value label.

components.name: QuanticPager
components.description: The QuanticPager provides buttons that allow the end user to navigate through the different result pages.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

components.name: QuanticQueryError
components.description: The QuanticQueryError component handles fatal errors when performing a query on the index or Search API. When the error is known, it displays a link to relevant documentation link for debugging purposes. When the error is unknown, it displays a small text area with the JSON content of the error.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

components.name: QuanticResultList
components.description: The QuanticResultList component is responsible for displaying query results by applying one or more result templates.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

components.name: QuanticResultsPerPage
components.description: The QuanticResultsPerPage component determines how many results to display per page.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

components.name: QuanticSearchBox
components.description: The QuanticSearchBox component creates a search box with built-in support for query suggestions.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: The placeholder text to display in the search box input area.

properties.name: withoutSubmitButton
properties.description: Whether not to render a submit button.

properties.name: numberOfSuggestions
properties.description: The maximum number of suggestions to display.

components.name: QuanticSearchBoxSuggestionsList
components.description: The QuanticSearchBoxSuggestionsList is used internally by SearchBox components to display the query suggestions in an omnibox.

properties.name: suggestions
properties.description: The query suggestions to display.

components.name: QuanticSearchInterface
components.description:
The QuanticSearchInterface component handles the headless search engine and localization configurations. A single instance should be used for each instance of the Coveo Headless search engine.

The timezone used in the search engine options is taken from the Time Zone settings of the Salesforce org.

The timezone is used to correctly interpret dates in the query expression, facets, and result items.

The locale used in the search engine options is taken from the Language Settings

Coveo Machine Learning models use this information to provide contextually relevant output. Moreover, this information can be referred to in query expressions and QPL statements by using the $locale object.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: searchHub
properties.description: The search interface search hub.

properties.name: pipeline
properties.description: The search interface query pipeline

properties.name: disableStateInUrl
properties.description: Whether the state should not be reflected in the URL parameters.

properties.name: skipFirstSearch
properties.description: Whether not to perform a search once the interface and it's components are initialized.

components.name: QuanticSort
components.description: The QuanticSort component renders a dropdown that the end user can interact with to select the criteria to use when sorting query results.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

components.name: QuanticStandaloneSearchBox
components.description: The QuanticStandaloneSearchBox component creates a search box with built-in support for query suggestions.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: The placeholder text to display in the search box input area.

properties.name: withoutSubmitButton
properties.description: Whether not to render a submit button.

properties.name: numberOfSuggestions
properties.description: The maximum number of suggestions to display.

properties.name: redirectUrl
properties.description: The url of the search page to redirect to when a query is made. The target search page should contain a QuanticSearchInterface with the same engine ID specified for this component.

components.name: QuanticSummary
components.description: The QuanticSummary component displays information about the current range of results and the request duration (e.g., "Results 1-10 of 123 in 0.47 seconds").

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

components.name: QuanticTab
components.description: The QuanticSearchBox component creates a search box with built-in support for query suggestions.

properties.name: engineId
properties.description: The ID of the engine instance with which to register.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The non-localized label for the tab.

properties.name: expression
properties.description: The constant query expression or filter that the Tab should add to any outgoing query.
